title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for series, the software does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for series, the software should display a friendly error message.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the software. 2. Navigate to the series without any data. 3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
